Namespace ChebsValheimLibrary.Minions

Classes

ChebGonazMinion

The ChebGonazMinion class is the basis for all minions. It serves multiple purposes:

  • Identification: To determine whether a creature was created by the mod.
  • Wait/Follow/Roam functionality
  • Ownership functionality
  • Helper methods/functions eg. FindClosest, FindNearby

FreshMinion

The FreshMinion is added and used as a way of determining whether a minion was freshly created or whether it is pre-existing. As such, different functionality can be implemented in the minion's Awake or other methods.

NukeRock

A component that can be added to a rock in order to destroy it after a period.

NukeTree

A component that can be added to a tree in order to destroy it after a period.

Enums

ChebGonazMinion.ArmorType

The armor type the minion is equipped with.

ChebGonazMinion.CleanupType

Cleanup enum to determine what happens to a minion.

  • None: Default - take no special action.
  • Time: Minions destroyed after an elapsed time.
  • Logout: Minions owned by a player are destroyed when the player logs out.

ChebGonazMinion.DropType

Action to take regarding refunding of resources used to create a minion when it dies.

  • Nothing: Generate no CharacterDrop at all.
  • JustResources: Just save the armor type eg. iron ingots.
  • Everything: Drop everything that was used to create the minion eg. bones, meat, iron ingots.

ChebGonazMinion.State

  • Waiting: Minion follows an empty gameobject and thus remains rooted in place.
  • Roaming: Default Valheim MonsterAI behaviour for when no follow object is set.
  • Following: Default valheim MonsterAI behaviour for when a follow object is set.
